about__description_line_1.message: Side-trakt is a powerful Chrome extension designed to seamlessly access your trakt.tv collections and lists. With Side-trakt, you can effortlessly browse, track, and manage your favorite shows and movies directly from your web browser.
about__description_line_1.description: First line of the description of the about page

about__description_line_2.message: Whether you're exploring new content, tracking your progress, or updating your history, Side-trakt allows you to consult, mark as watched, or add to your collection with just a few clicks.
about__description_line_2.description: Second line of the description of the about page

about__contribute__description_line_1.message: Side-trakt is a free and open-source project developed by a single individual. Please consider making a small donation, leaving a review in the web store, contributing to the code base, or providing feedback by reporting issues or suggesting new features on GitHub.
about__contribute__description_line_1.description: First line of the description of the contribute section in the about page

about__contribute__description_line_2.message: Your support, be it through donations, reviews, or feedback, is deeply appreciated and significantly aids in the maintenance of the application
about__contribute__description_line_2.description: Second line of the description of the contribute section in the about page

about__contribute__description_line_3.message: Please consider supporting the development of trakt.tv and/or tmdb as well as they play vital roles in this extension's functionality.
about__contribute__description_line_3.description: Third line of the description of the contribute section in the about page
